message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its potential value, I'm initially proposing a price of $950,000. I believe this is a fair starting point for discussions.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $700,000 significantly undervalues this product and its potential. I'm willing to come down to $900,000.  This reflects the true value of what's being offered.
I'm still not convinced that $900,000 is a fair price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $850,000. I believe this is a more reasonable compromise.
